reviews.review: 재밌어요
Ehre

J'adore Dead by Daylight, même si normalement je déteste les jeux d'horreur!
Je vous conseille quand même d'attendre qu'il soit en rabais pour acheter le plus de pack/DLC possible.

Ce jeu fait partie de la catégorie : plus j'y joue plus je l'adore! 
Je vous conseille fortement de commencer avec un ami ou des amis plus expérimenté(s) et voici pourquoi :

Ce jeu oppose 4 survivants à un tueur assoiffé de sang. Il y a plusieurs survivants uniques, plusieurs tueurs uniques et plusieurs maps uniques inspirer de multiples films d'horreur et de suspence! Au début on n'y comprend absolument rien tellement il y a d'informations différentes, mais au fil des parties on comprend mieux comment ça ce passe. Jouer autant tueur que survivant est très plaisant et nous permet de voir les forces et les faiblesses des rôles/personnages différents. La coopération est essentielle pour réparer les générateurs, se soigner et se sauver du tueur. Le système de niveau est très bien pensé et n'est pas trop facile, n'y trop compliqué à utiliser. 

Il y a quand même quelques petits côtés moins plaisants.
Les trois principaux sont :
 - Un matchmaking complètement briser! Il n'est pas rare de tomber sur des survivants/tueurs de rang très élevé même lorsqu'on est débutant. 
 - Le jeu va souvent crasher en queue/lobby, surtout avec les invitations, et vous obliger à redémarrer le jeu.
 - Les tueurs ont un temps d'attente très très long entre chacune de leurs parties.

Bref, c'est une perle rare dans son style qui vaut vraiment la peine d'y mettre du temps!
En espérant vous avoir aidé à vous faire un bon avis du jeu et on se revoit aux générateurs ;)

2021
After more than 100 hours played I think I can review the game again, you can do a lot to win but Playing as survivor it makes the game really bad because of tunnel and campers and if you are playing alone the games is almost tresh because almost every survivor I found is bad and if you are playing as the killer everything changes the games will be fun if you play correct like using a good killer and good build of perks now I'm playing Pig and Nurse so it's fun but when I play with SWF they are always toxic I don't think that people should be toxic and this make the game sad :( but I still like playing so I will give you the recomendation to see the profile of the survivors to see if you need to tryhard a lot or not.

2020
Do you think you can have fun playing killer? , the answer will never be yes, you will always fall against people 10 ranks better than yours, Time full always and always with delayed Borrow time, the only way to win is playing with horrible killers  like Cannibal.


Você acha  pode se divertir jogando de killer ? , a resposta jamais será sim, você sempre caira contra gente 10 ranks melhor que o seu, Time full sempre e sempre com retardadismo do Borrow time, o unico jeito de ganhar é jogando com boneco horrendos como Canibal.


2019

Do you think you can have fun playing Survivor? , the answer is no. you will always fall against Killers 10 Rank better than yours, people who always have everything right and good and guess what? your companions will always be rubbish, unless you have a SWF stuck to you 100% of the games you play, the rest of the games you play solo will be the worst experience of your life, nobody is useful, nobody makes a generator, nobody helps, nobody can stay alive, they are always companions that harm you. that is, either play with friends as a survivor or play kill your friends - alternative game mode-. never play killer to try to have fun you will just be angry.


Você acha que pode se divertir jogando de Survivor ? , a Reposta é não. você sempre cairá contra Killers 10 Rank melhor que o seu, gente que sempre tem tudo de certo e de bom e adivinha ? seus companheiros serão sempre um lixo, a não ser que vc tenha uma SWF colada em você 100% dos games que você joga , o resto das partidas que você joga solo será a pior experiencia da sua vida, ninguém é útil, ninguém faz gerador, ninguém Ajuda, ninguém consegue ficar vivo, sempre são companheiros que te prejudicam. ou seja , ou jogue com amigos sendo de survivor ou jogue mate seus amigos -modo alternativo de game- . jamais jogue de killer pra tentar se divertir você só passara raiva.

遊戲蠻好玩的，也很考驗玩家之間的合作，玩慣了單機需要一點多人遊戲的刺激（雖然遇到鬼就整個弱掉 XD），不少 IP 合作也很有趣。有時候會遇到好心鬼送你過關感覺窩心，哈哈，在此感謝各位好心鬼大德 XD

唯一想挑的缺點是本地化，就……還是有一些簡體中文摻雜在裡面 @@

2021/9/7

又玩了好一陣子，補一下感想。從我加入開始的版本，倖存者的修機速度真的很快（當然自己玩倖存者的時候會希望修快一點），扮演殺手的玩家如果不是非常熟練的高手，遊戲體驗很難被滿足。在玩倖存者的時候，很受不了殺手直接死站在鉤子前面等你掛死…如果是被殺手針對那還能怪在網路延遲和技不如人，但面守到死就是毫無翻盤機會（還遇過紅段護士守鉤子，有夠扯）

至於有些行為是不是 BM (Bad Manner) 我覺得這每個人心中有一把尺（還是有人有比較明確的定義 XD）。不過心理戰也是這遊戲重要的一環，所以我倒不會特別覺得是不是沒禮貌，我個人比較反感的是不把一整局打完就拔線中離（撇除真的線路爛掉段線的那種）…有點運動家精神好嗎 XD

玩殺手到玩到惱羞比倖存者成功逃生還容易，遇到喜歡玩手電筒、穿著人皇外套、造型騷浪的我就爆氣了，先掛再說！！！有掛到一個兩個就覺得有被滿足到了，就能默默關遊戲睡覺（？）

To think I have so many hours in this game and I’m just giving it a review. Anyways, this game will take you on a rollercoaster of emotions. From being angry at the bugs that haven’t been fixed, annoyed at teammates, feeling anxious as you go against a stealth killer or opening an exit gate as the last survivor. Will you have time to open it and escape or will the killer have enough time to catch you? Will you give the killer one last chase before the Endgame Collapse timer finishes or will you simply give up and let the killer hook you? That’s one thing that this game introduces. Micro-choices. Every trial you are constantly making choices as a Killer or Survivor that could completely change the outcome of the game. Will I go unhook my teammate? Will I drop this pallet or go onto the next available loop if the killer misses? Will I continue chasing this survivor or go after someone else? That’s what I feel keeps the game fresh every trial is that there are so many things that could happen. Now, it is not a perfect game by any means. You will encounter frustrating bugs. The match making system will place you in games that are not in your rank/skill level. Certain perks may not feel fair or the way some players play certain killers i.e. tunnel, facecamp, slug, and etc. I still believe this a game worth getting. The team behind the game aren’t as big as other companies so they take awhile to address things but they do listen to the community/feedback. They are constantly trying to strive for greatness and bring exciting ideas/content to us. Every content update they link a survey so they can see what we as the community think and what they can change based on our responses. The game started 4 years ago with few original killers/survivors created by the team. Now in 2020 we have a numerous amount of original characters and even a good amount of horror icons as killers and survivors. You could play as Steve Harrington from Stranger Things and go against Leatherface from The Texas Chainsaw Massacre. You could play as Amanda from the Saw series and put Reverse Bear Traps on Laurie from Halloween, Ash from Ash vs the Evil Dead, and as of recently Cheryl (aka Heather) from the Silent Hill series. The game has achieved so much and continues to grow. The original killers and survivors that they also come up with are interesting. Each have their own set of perks that can be later be used on other characters of that same role and each with their own backstory. They are also expanding on their original concepts in the Archives by giving us anecdotes of their life before they were taken by the Entity for the trials.  There is so much effort being put into the game. If you have the patience to put up with some of the cons listed above and the learning curve then I highly recommend this game. I’ve had such a blast the past 2 years since I’ve bought the game and I don’t see myself quitting the game anytime soon. If you have any questions about anything feel free to add/message me!
